brand.title: Voyadecir
hero.sub: Powered by the latest advancements in AI technology, Voyadecir bridges languages through intelligent translation and interpretation — helping you translate, understand, and connect effortlessly across the world.
about.title: About Voyadecir
about.body: Voyadecir helps people communicate clearly across languages with a clean, elegant experience. We believe in global connection, intelligent tools, and quiet craftsmanship.
contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: Send us a note. We’ll get back to you soon.
contact.name: Name
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.body: We design for privacy first. This static site uses no cookies or trackers by default. If you choose to use our translator, it may rely on third-party APIs according to their policies.
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.body: Use Voyadecir responsibly. We provide the service as‑is, with no guarantees. By using the site, you agree not to misuse the service.
